column5: Last night my brothers and I recorded dads old home movies. This excerpt was interesting, thought I'd share it here.  This group of fellows includes my dad (taking the movie), uncles and friends of our family. The truck belonged to a family friend.  We recorded this off the screen, so there are some comments along with the video from the peanut gallery.
Nice old video, nothing like armstrong power to get the job done.
That's pretty dang neat Bernie.  Good to hear your voice too  Merry Christmas.
Neat video Bernie... thanks for putting it up here. I hope you and your family had a great Xmas. Happy New year as well! HH
Great vid. Bernie. I had to catch my breath and have a beer just watching that.   Bernie, wasn't there a member her with the handle Kiltey Lake?

Glad you fellas liked that.  Had a wonderful Christmas Joe. Hope you did too.  Nip, I used Kiltylake on another board. Think it was Ontario Out of Doors. Maybe that's where you seen it.  Kilty Lake is the lake our hunt camp is on.
Thanks Bernie.  You mean there are "other" boards? Lol.
That's a really cool video Bernie?  Didn't anyone fish while you were doing that?? LOL
